sense.gloss: aim, what one wants, the mark
key point (of a conversation, etc.), essence
acupuncture point, moxibustion point, pressure point
position on the fingerboard (of a shamisen, koto, etc.)

sdata.j: その↑陰謀↑↓いんぼう↓を↑画策↑↓かくさく↓してる↑人↑↓ひと↓たちを↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓に↑大↑↓おお↓きく↑見↑↓み↓てしまうことは、まさに↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑思↑↓おも↓う|ツボ|だと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I think overestimating the people masterminding that conspiracy is exactly what they want.

sdata.j: ↑笑↑↓わら↓いの|ツボ|をおさえてるね。いいね。
sdata.e: You have a sense of humour. I like that.
